name: The Adventures of King Pistachio
description:
This is the first game I ever made. It is a 2D platformer where you are the king of the Ice Cream Realm and you have to stop some unusual invaders from taking your kingdom. This was made for Ludum Dare 32 in December 2014 by me, João Pedro Mantovani and Leonardo Millan (aka.: legacycrono).

Arrows - for moving the character

Space - for attacking
